thread.title: James 'Lockie' Lock films TOWIE with new girlfriend, while ex Danielle Armstrong holidays with footballer boyfriend
thread.title_full: James 'Lockie' Lock films TOWIE with new girlfriend, while ex Danielle Armstrong holidays with footballer boyfriend

author: Lara Martin
title: James 'Lockie' Lock films TOWIE with new girlfriend, while ex Danielle Armstrong holidays with footballer boyfriend
text:
Celebs James 'Lockie' Lock films TOWIE with new girlfriend, while ex Danielle Armstrong holidays with footballer boyfriend It looks like Lockie's new girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou will appear in the new series of The Only Way Is Essex Share James Locke and Yazmin Oukhellou arrive at Faces (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
His ex-girlfriend Danielle Armstrong has just been enjoying a romantic Dubai holiday with new footballer boyfriend Daniel Spiller. 
And now James ‘Lockie’ Lock has shown he’s very much moved on as well, stepping out to film TOWIE on Sunday with his new girlfriend, Yazmin Oukhellou. 
Lockie was pictured arriving at Faces nightclub in Essex holding hands with Yazmin, who he’s been linked to since January. 
The restaurant owner looked smitten with the beautiful brunette, giving her an admiring glance as they rocked up to film scenes for a St Patrick’s Day episode. (Hence the green clothing!) Lockie looked smitten with Yazmin (Photo: FameFlynet) They dressed in green to film St Patrick's Day episodes (Photo: FameFlynet) Yazmin said Lockie spoiled her on Valentine's Day (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Lockie, 30, confirmed his romance with Yazmin, 23, on Instagram, sharing a photo of them last week at dinner together. 
He also publicly wished her Happy Valentine’s Day. 
Yazmin, meanwhile, praised the Lockie’s Kitchen owner for “absolutely spoiling” her on Valentine’s Day, sharing photos of his gifts including a chocolate and strawberry drenched cake, red roses, heart shaped balloons and a card addressed to the “one I love.” https://www.instagram.com/p/BQTbsM-BmMS/embed 
Lockie's last relationship was with TOWIE co-star Danielle; they were together before joining the show and fans watched them go through several ups and downs on screen - including an engagement and cheating allegations - before finally calling it quits. 
On the Christmas special, Danielle announced she was leaving TOWIE in order to move on with her life, as it was too difficult to do that while hanging around Lockie. 
Lockie told her: “I do wish you all the best, I mean that. I’m sure you’re going to go off and have the fairytale ending you’ve always wanted and I wish that for you." Lockie with ex-girlfriend Danielle (Photo: Rex) Lockie with Danielle in a TOWIE scene (Photo: ITV) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
